Title: Security update for the Linux Kernel (Live Patch 14 for SLE 15)

Notes.Text: Security update for the Linux Kernel (Live Patch 14 for SLE 15)
Notes.Title: Topic

Notes.Text:
This update for the Linux Kernel 4.12.14-150_35 fixes several issues.

The following security issue was fixed:

- CVE-2019-10220: Fixed an issue where samba servers could inject relative paths in directory entry lists (bsc#1153108).

The following bugs were fixed:

- Fixed boot up hang revealed by int3 self test (bsc#1157770).
Notes.Title: Details
